description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Settle down for a cozy night with a fire that's already been made for you.  Let "Virtual Fireplace" do the work for you so can relax and enjoy your night.  With different features, including a scene to add a log, you can have a roaring fire from the first flame to dying embers.  Choose your mantle while your avatar is present or simply have a full screen fire!
description.short: Settle down for a cozy night with a fire that's already been made for you.  Let "Virtual Fireplace" do the work for you so can relax and enjoy your night.  With different features, including a scene to add a log, you can have a roaring fire from the first flame to dying embers.  Choose your mantle while your avatar is present or simply have a full screen fire!
